long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
imgding is a tool to download images from image hosts. It searches the current tab for links to images and downloads them.

Links to images on image hosts are collected from the current tab. The images are downloaded into a sub folder of the default download folder (see second screenshot).

Currently following image hosts are supported:
    hotflick net (since 0.0.27)
    ibb co
    imagebam com
    imgbox com
    imagetwist com
    imagevenue com
    pimpandhost com
    pixhost to
    turboimagehost com


Attention: Set a default download folder
If you have "Always ask where to save files" activated in your Browser then it will ask you for every image where to save it. If the page contains 100 images, it will ask a 100 times.
